message.body: I realized I wasn't talented or disciplined enough to become an artist, so...
Ok. I try not to be too much of a hater, but seriously? He's pretty much living the dream.
Right, it's totally not fair that that guy is living the dream. His farm is beautiful
I mean, it's really good for him right? Just 'cause he made fun of me a bunch doesn't mean he doesn't deserve all the best.
Where's our farm, lady? We need to get on that. :-)
Right, of course. Just because someone is a horrible person doesn't mean they don't deserve a fulfilling life
Ha!! Thank you. So much. Sometimes i feel like I'm being irrational and you just make me realize that I'm not. Fuck. Just... Fuck!
Yeah why can't we inherit a functioning farm as well as the wealth to run it. That guy goes against karma
I know what you mean..like I couldn't really "explain" to anyone why I don't like him
Agreed. Adam's folks gave us that and they were all excited that it was the"guy that Katie was dating!" because they love her. ouch followed by ouch.
Ugh is he still dating her? She's awful
